ISSUE.TITLE: Add support for JSON patch for the API
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Feature Idea ##### SUMMARY Currently when updating a standalone field like AUTH_LDAP_ORGANIZATION_MAP, we have to provide the complete JSON document. With JSON patch we can express a sequence of operations to apply to a target JSON document.
